title: Costs from scandal piling up for Volkswagen, with spot as No. 1 carmaker likely to be lost
text:
Published By: Fox News: World - Today 
For Volkswagen, the cost of its cheating on emissions tests in the U.S. is likely to run into the tens of billions of dollars and prematurel...
